resources.string: Select which microphone to use. Default top mic for P9, check this for S8.

User Instructions: 

1. Register new user 
Turn the switch button to "train" and input the user name, then click OK. 

2. Training data collection 
Click ON/OFF button to start data collection, make sure the face area (red rectangle) is between the two green rectangles. Turn the switch to "user" which indicates the user is in presence, otherwise turn the switch to "others", and collect "attack" users' data. Click ON/OFF button to stop and save data. 

3. Model training 
Once data collection is done, click TRAIN button to train a model based on the data collected just now for a single user. Long press TRAIN button will train a model for this user leveraging all the registered data (others' data as attacks). 

4. Real-time authentication 
Once training is done, turn the switch to "predict", and click ON/OFF button to start real-time authentication. 

5. Different phones 
Turn the switch to P9 or S8 to select microphones, we use top microphone. 

6. Delete user 
Select the user in drop down box, and click DELETE button, then confirm. 

7. Data directories 
The root directory is /EchoPrint/ 
User data is located in subfolder /userData/ 
Trained model and auto-generated files are in /generatedData/
